TAGLINE: Tired of endlessly waiting at your bus stop?
LIVE_TRACKING_DETAILS: The trackCTA app uses live data from the CTA servers to show the location of busses and predictions.
LOCALE_DETAILS: The trackCTA app is available in the 3 most spoken languages in Chicago - English, Spanish and Chinese.
PERSONAL_DETAILS: Bookmark your favorite busses and stops so that you can quickly visit them whenever you want.
RESPONSIVE_DETAILS: The trackCTA app is a 100% responsive and is designed to work on mobile phones, tablets and other screens.
COMING_SOON: Coming soon on Android and iOS
